## hasNoErrors() function

Tests whether a given [MatchResult](./case-plugin-base.matchresult.md) object has no errors.

**Signature:**

```typescript
hasNoErrors: (result: MatchResult) => boolean
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

</td><td>

[MatchResult](./case-plugin-base.matchresult.md)


</td><td>

a [MatchResult](./case-plugin-base.matchresult.md) object


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

boolean

true if `result` has no errors (ie, is a passing [MatchResult](./case-plugin-base.matchresult.md)<!-- -->)
